alert.note: Alert for Clinton; Marion (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 17 at 4:09AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of south central Illinois, including the following counties, Clinton and Marion. * WHEN...Until 815 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 409 AM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Between 1 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Salem, Sandoval, Odin, Fairman, Shattuc, Boulder, Tonti, Junction City, Alma, Selmaville, Brubaker and Ferrin.
info.instruction: Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.
